nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'sedimentTracers' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'sedimentTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_sedimentTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'sedimentTracers' category
